title: AXIOM - open source cinema camera
subtitle: Project Introduction and current state of development
track: Open Source Computer Aided Modeling and Design
abstract: The presentation will give a brief overview of the projects history & lessons learned during the course of developing a high tech camera device as community project. We also want to demo and explain the produced hardware, enclosures and sample footage then look at the challenges still ahead. Last 10 minutes reserved for Q&A
